root.name: Scribblenauts Remix
root.description: OverviewScribblenauts Remix is a puzzle/platformer developed by Iron Galaxy Studios and published by WB Games for the iPhone and iPad platforms. Launching with 50 levels (10 of which are exclusively available for this release), Remix's updates have added an 40 additional levels, in addition to historical figures, monster avatars, new playgrounds, an arcade machine, etc.
